attributes.action: Give discount leisure fees to over 60s who Are members of sport or gym clubs
attributes.additional_details: Because it would encourage olde people to join sport or leisure clubs and therefore reduce the burden on the welfare star and nhs
attributes.background: I want the government to recognise that a large amount of the population over 60 keep fit and healthy but do not get any membership discount. We are helping the nhs and should be rewarded

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for discounts provided by gyms or leisure centres, this is a matter for individual gyms or leisure centres.

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to fund gyms or leisure centre memberships for over 60s, because of the associated health benefits this could bring.
